author: Retro Game Corps
description:
In this video, we'll set up the ideal dual-screen experience on devices like the AYN Thor and AYANEO Pocket DS.

Written guide: https://retrogamecorps.com/2025/10/27/dual-screen-android-handheld-guide/
Android starter guide: https://youtu.be/I4mqgcDYZFo

Stylus guide video: https://youtu.be/BoYp30Meki0
Homemade stylus: https://www.etsy.com/listing/4389860171/small-gaming-stylus-solid-aluminum-retro
use code RETROSTYLUS for 30% off

title: Dual Screen Handheld Starter Guide
